name: fetishism
content:
fetishism noun [U]
(INTEREST)
Add to word list
Add to word list
psychology
  specialized behaviour in which someone shows a sexual interest in an object, or in a part of the body other than the sexual organs: Foot fetishism has little to do with procreation. She found out her husband had called a phone sex-line specializing in fetishism.
behaviour in which someone has so much interest in an object or activity that they spend an unreasonable amount of time thinking about it or doing it: There is a fetishism for sport in our society. He believes that shoe fetishism is almost ubiquitous among women.

fetishism noun [U]
(WORSHIP)
in some societies, the act of worshipping an object because it is believed to have a spirit or special magical powers: Their fetishism was less a worship of various things than a use of the objects as charms and protections. The temple illustrates the animal fetishism that lies at the dark roots of Egyptian religion.
